content.en: AI in Medicine: Researchers are exploring the potential benefits of artificial intelligence (AI) in medicine and how it can be achieved. They are focusing on empowering healthcare workers through AI-based applications for medical education and training, revolutionizing education system practices using AI in healthcare education, and incorporating AI in medical education curriculum to address challenges and equip future physicians. The goal is to increase awareness, understanding, and acceptance of AI in medicine among medical students, interns, and physicians, and to inform curriculum development to prepare the healthcare workforce for working with AI.
content.da: AI i Medicin: Forskere undersøger de potentielle fordele ved kunstig intelligens (AI) i medicin og hvordan de kan opnås. De fokuserer på at styrke sundhedspersonale gennem AI-baserede applikationer til medicinsk uddannelse og træning, revolutionere uddannelsespraksis ved brug af AI i sundhedsuddannelse samt inkorporere AI i den medicinske uddannelsesplan for at tackle udfordringer og udstyre fremtidige læger. Målet er at øge bevidstheden, forståelsen og accepten af AI i medicin blandt medicinstuderende, praktikanter og læger, og at informere læseplansudvikling for at forberede sundhedsarbejdsstyrken på at arbejde med AI.
